Example for demoing a bokeh server with Binder

[![app](https://img.shields.io/badge/launch-binder%20app-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/panel-demos/clifford-interact/master?urlpath=/proxy/5006/clifford) [![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/launch-binder%20notebook-F5A252.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/panel-demos/clifford-interact/master?filepath=clifford.ipynb)

Serves the `clifford.ipynb` app on mybinder, exploring the parameter space of clifford attractors as images rendered using datashader.

Developed by @jsignell

![dashboard screenshot](https://github.com/pyviz-demos/clifford/blob/master/assets/dashboard.png)

## Repo Contents

This repo contains:

- an `environment.yml` used by conda for installing bokeh and nbserverproxy
- a custom serverextension (`panelserverextension.py`) that launches the bokeh
  server
- a `postBuild` script used to enable the server extensions on
  **Binder (mybinder.org)** and install the local one (this last step would go
  away if the local extension became a proper package)
- A [panel](https://github.com/pyviz/panel) based notebook, `clifford.ipynb`,
  used to serve both notebook and app based deployments

## Binder

This repo demonstrates the files needed to run Panel and serve a Panel Dashboard
when using the Binder service, [mybinder.org](https://mybinder.org).

### Files used by Binder

When launching this repo on Binder, Binder uses the `environment.yml` to
install the required packages needed to run the panel based notebook
`clifford.ipynb`. Binder uses the `postBuild` script to activate a notebook
extension `panelserverextension.py` and run a bokeh server used to serve the
panel dashboard.

### Dashboard on mybinder.org

Launch the Panel dashboard:

[![app](https://img.shields.io/badge/launch-binder%20app-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/panel-demos/clifford-interact/master?urlpath=/proxy/5006/clifford)

### Panel based Jupyter Notebook on mybinder.org

Launch the Jupyter notebook with Panel code:

[![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/launch-binder%20notebook-F5A252.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/panel-demos/clifford-interact/master?filepath=clifford.ipynb)
